pageList.name: 二级
pageList.rule:
js:
var d = []
var html = getResCode()
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/lazy')).rule)
d.push({
    title: pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(导演：)&&Text')
    +'\n'+ pdfh(html,'.search-show&&li:contains(主演：)&&Text')
    +'\n' + pdfh(html,'.search-show&&li:contains(更新：)&&Text'),
    desc: '简介:'+pdfh(html, '.check&&Text'),
    img:pd(html,'.lazy&&data-src'),
    url: MY_URL,
    col_type: 'movie_1_vertical_pic_blur'
});

var 线路 = '.nav-swiper&&a'
var 选集 = 'body&&.anthology-list-box'
var 线路名 = 'a&&Text'
var 选集列表 = 'ul&&li'
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/erji?rule=模板·Q')).rule)
setResult(d)

pageList.rule:
js:
var d = []
var html = getResCode()
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/lazy1')).rule)

d.push({
    title: pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(导演：)&&Text') +
        '\n' + pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(主演：)&&Text') +
        '\n' + pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(更新：)&&Text'),
    desc: '简介:' + pdfh(html, '.check&&Text'),
    img: pd(html, '.lazy&&data-src'),
    url: MY_URL,
    col_type: 'movie_1_vertical_pic_blur'
});
var 线路 = '.nav-swiper&&a:not(:matches(下载))'
var 选集 = 'body&&.anthology-list-box'
var 线路名 = 'a&&Text'
var 选集列表 = 'ul&&li'
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/erji?rule=模板·Q')).rule)
setResult(d)

title: 橘子动漫

pageList.name: 动态
二级
pageList.rule:
js:
var d = []
MY_URL=MY_URL.replace('hiker://empty##' ,'')
log(MY_URL)
var html = request(input,{headers: {
        //"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest",
        'Cookie': getItem(MY_HOME, ""), 
    }})

  d.push({
    title: pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(导演：)&&Text') +
        '\n' + pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(主演：)&&Text') +
        '\n' + pdfh(html, '.search-show&&li:contains(更新：)&&Text'),
    desc: '简介:' + pdfh(html, '.check&&Text'),
    img: pd(html, '.lazy&&data-src'),
    url: MY_URL,
    col_type: 'movie_1_vertical_pic_blur'
});
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/lazy')).rule)

var 线路 = '.nav-swiper&&a:not(:matches(下载))'
var 选集 = 'body&&.anthology-list-box'
var 线路名 = 'a--i&&Text'
var 选集列表 = 'ul&&li'
eval(JSON.parse(request('hiker://page/erji?rule=模板·Q')).rule)
setResult(d)
